resources.string: We come together to bond with fellow members of the interest group!
We meet up as one interest group to attend talks, do experiments, discuss our theories to problems, learn new things, and have fun!
Quanta members help with events like Open House, DSA Camp, and DSA preview!
We took pictures for the Dec 26 solar eclipse!
We host fun booths for EXcite you can come see!
Follow us on instagram for random physics trivia!
